description.value: The secret society member has a few tricks most others do not. They gain two of the following skill feats: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Charming Liar], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Courtly Graces], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Glean Contents], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Hobnobber], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Lengthy Diversion], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Lie To Me], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Quick Coercion], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Streetwise]. If they are at least 2nd level, they can also choose from among the following: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Discreet Inquiry], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Glad-Hand], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Lasting Coercion]. If they are at least 7th level, they can also choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Shameless Request] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Slippery Secrets].
